long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creating eye-catching posts has always been time-consuming and Annoying. Not anymore. Introducing a quick, free and user-friendly style enhancer for your Linkedin content.

How it works?
This extension adds custom formatting buttons to your LinkedIn post editor, allowing you to use bold, italic, bullets and more in your posts.

- No need to leave LinkedIn
- Simple to use
- 100% free
